name: Random Tower Defense
description:
Random Tower Defense

Place one of 4 different weapons down to stop waves of enemies from getting through. The catch is: You don't get to pick where the weapons are placed. Sometimes the weapon you buy will replace a weapon already on the field. It's random!

The Weapons

  • Single Shot - The basic gun that fires one round at a time
  • Triple Shot - Fires three rounds at a time
  • Laser - Shoots a beam that does damage over time
  • Grenade Launcher - Launches a grenade that explodes on impact, damaging any enemy in its area
